Bulker was targeted by missiles in Bab al-Mandab - Ambrey, UKMTOThe UK Maritime Trade Operations agency received a report of an incident 40 nautical miles southwest of Yemen's Red Sea port city of Mokha, where the ship reported it had been attacked by two missiles. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 06:31:37 GMT EXL7QTB2PZI63B6M3HLHHHCNWA https://www.reuters.com/world/ambrey-says-bulker-was-targeted-by-missiles-bab-al-mandab-2024-02-12/Reuters世界
Indonesia students plan to protest alleged poll interferenceHundreds of Indonesian students and activists will stage protests on Monday over what they see as outgoing President Joko Widodo's abuse of power to sway voters in this week's election in favour of frontrunner, Prabowo Subianto, organisers said. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 05:46:13 GMT GYDG6LTWANLLHHO343OSHOT3EQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesia-students-plan-protest-alleged-poll-interference-2024-02-12/Ananda Teresia世界亚太地区
Republicans blast Trump over threat to abandon NATO alliesSome of former President Donald Trump's fellow Republicans on Sunday lashed out at him for saying he would not want to protect NATO members from a future attack by Russia if those countries' contributions to the defense alliance were lagging. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 05:03:32 GMT AV2I5FEXWBPCHARIEKUS3G7I5A https://www.reuters.com/world/us/republicans-blast-trump-over-threat-abandon-nato-allies-2024-02-12/Richard Cowan世界美国
Poland's Tusk visits Paris, Berlin, as security concerns loom largePoland's Prime Minister Donald Tusk travels to France and Germany on Monday as the three European Union members seek to bind closer in the face of mounting security risks. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 05:01:42 GMT AFEXM2LFZVJK3FNKRR6F52FKCM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polands-tusk-visits-paris-berlin-security-concerns-loom-large-2024-02-12/Marek Strzelecki, Alan Charlish世界欧洲
Ukraine destroys 14 of 17 Russia-launched drones - Ukraine air forceUkraine's air defence systems destroyed 14 out of 17 drones that Russia launched overnight and one Kh-59 cruise missile, Ukraine's Air Force said on Monday. Chiefs beat Niners in Sin City Super Bowl overtime thrillerPatrick Mahomes threw a touchdown pass to Mecole Hardman in overtime to give the Kansas City Chiefs a 25-22 win over the San Francisco 49ers in a 'Sin City' Super Bowl thriller on Sunday, cementing their status as an NFL dynasty. Mon, 12 Feb 2024 03:50:16 GMT MF7OF5TFIRMEDHZRRLFM2UULUI https://www.reuters.com/sports/nfl/chiefs-beat-49ers-repeat-super-bowl-champions-2024-02-12/Steve Keating运动的国家橄榄球联盟

Dance moves and deepfakes: Indonesia presidential candidates duke it out on TikTokAt an Indonesian presidential campaign event, 22-year-old voter Irene Putri Aisyah was busy uploading everything she saw - from cute dances to cooking demonstrations - to short video app TikTok. Israel frees two hostages in Rafah under cover of air strike; health officials say 37 killedIsrael launched a special forces operation that freed two Israeli hostages in Rafah amid air strikes early on Monday, which local health officials said killed 37 people and wounded dozens in the southern Gaza city. Qatar frees eight Indians months after dropping death sentencesQatar has released eight Indian ex-naval officers after dropping their death sentences, India's foreign ministry said on Monday, crediting the Qatari emir for the decision more than 18 months after their arrest challenged diplomatic ties.
